fields.headline: OneNote from Comdex
fields.bodyText: Of all the things show at Comdex, one has the chance to be outstandingly useful: Microsoft's OneNote. This will be a new Office application, and therefore very widely distributed. It also fills a need, in gathering up useful but possibly epehmeral information. Of course, the people who really need this sort of thing have probably already adopted or adapted an application to do the job -- in my case, AskSam.
